definition: Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]
same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: NOC is Yuan Weimin, Ministry of the state General Administration for Sports.
sentences.chinese: 現任中國奧委會主席是國家體育總局局長袁偉民。

sentences.english: All rights to the Olympic symbol belong exclusively to the IOC.
sentences.chinese: 奧林匹克標誌的所有權屬國際奧委會專有。

sentences.english: Afore-mentioned concessionary products can use number of international Olympic committee.
sentences.chinese: 上述特許產品可以使用國際奧委會標記。

sentences.english: The current President of the NOC is Yuan Weimin, Ministry of the state General Administration for Sports.
sentences.chinese: 現任中國奧委會主席是國家體育總局局長袁偉民。

sentences.english: Through television, the IOC makes most of its money by selling rights to broadcast the games.
sentences.chinese: 國際奧委會的大部分收入來自於賽事的電視轉播費。

sentences.english: The U. S. Olympic Committee (USOC) and USA Swimming also expressed disappointment.
sentences.chinese: 美國奧委會及美國泳協都對此事表示失望。

sentences.english: European Olympic Comittees head Patrick Hickey said boycott never worked.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲奧委會主席希基說，抵制奧運從來沒有起過作用。

sentences.english: Since what time has Juan Antonio Samaranch been the president of the International Olympic Committee?
sentences.chinese: 薩馬藍奇從什麼時辰開始成爲國際奧委會主席的？

sentences.english: We are the only club that the CONI Arbitration did not give a discount to.
sentences.chinese: 我們是唯一一家意大利奧委會沒有減輕處罰的俱樂部。

sentences.english: As the reponse, Chinese Olympic Committee decided to take part in the 1980 Olympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 隨即，中國奧委會決定參加1980年的奧運會。

sentences.english: The IOC minimum requirement for a gold medal is 6g of the pure yellow metal.
sentences.chinese: 國際奧委會對金牌的要求是至少要有6克的金。

sentences.english: European Olympic Committees head Patrick Hickey said boycotts never worked.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲奧委會主席希基說，抵制奧運從來沒有起過作用。

sentences.english: There are a few problems we cannot overlook.
sentences.chinese: 中國奧委會主席劉鵬表示，“有一些問題不容忽視。

sentences.english: Athletes won't be required to wear the masks, which use carbon filters to block pollutants.
sentences.chinese: 奧委會不要求運動員戴上用碳濾器阻隔污染物的面具。

sentences.english: The IOC President appealed to the athletes to play their part as role models.
sentences.chinese: 國際奧委會主席呼籲運動員要爭當典範楷模。

sentences.english: Standing on the White House lawn, he delivered a message to the I. O. C.
sentences.chinese: 站在白空的草坪上，他向國際奧委會轉達了信息。
